author: timesunion.com
title: Rodger's Quick Take
text: The Giants' performance Monday was surprising and somewhat embarrassing. After the first drive of the game, which the Giants made look easy, nothing good happened. Bottom line: When QB Eli Manning has a bad night, the Giants aren't winning. The defense forced turnovers, but Manning threw a pick-six and was sacked three times. The Eagles did not play well; the Giants just played worse. New York has a quick turnaround before hosting the Cowboys on Sunday. NewsChannel 13's Rodger Wyland can be heard weekdays from 9 a.m. to noon on WOFX 980 AM.
